idea:
We, are engaged in offering the best range of Ferrous  and Non-Ferrous Metals. By catering to the needs of our numerous national and  international clients, we have become an entrusted name in the industry.
From our company customers receive a huge range of Stainless Steel Scrap,
Nickel Scrap, Cobalt Metal Scrap, Titanium Scrap, Alloy Steel Scrap, etc.
We have made a respectful place for our company as an eminent importer,
supplier and exporter as well as we have a dream to become a global trading leader. Having an extensive network and great industrial relations with vendors,  we are able to source a great as well as qualitative range from major manufacturing entities.
name: NIYAZ STEEL TRADING PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Digitally Social

Founded by a team of young digital marketers wanting to learn & explore opportunities in the Digital Marketing Industry, Digitally Social came a long way by delivering results like no other agency in the market. The culture followed in Digitally Socially makes our clients choose us every single time, our team makes sure that every penny spent by our clients gives them productive results. When we take up a project, we make sure that our clients believe in the services we are offering them, more importantly, believe in our team. Trust is the factor that pulls clients towards us, and we make sure that our clients don’t feel otherwise by being available for them at all times. Our team is always willing to prioritize our work, our drive towards being consistent with achieving great outcomes is what has helped us come this far.
name: Digitally Social - Digital Marketing Agency in Mumbai

idea:
Broadbox is an OTT aggregator based in India.

We combine multiple OTT services together to form packages which can be purchased. We also provide an optimized search engine where the user can search for any content across any OTT service.

Broadbox is a One Stop Shop for all media content across all OTT platforms which includes movies, TV shows, real time television as well as live television.

Broadbox also offers a premium service called Broadbox Premium which gives the user access to our proprietary communal theatre where the user can host any media content to watch with family, friends and other known users and can enjoy it together even if they are not at the same place.
name: BROADBOX ONLINE SERVICES PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: SUPPLY OF IT CONSUMABLES SUCH  PRINTER CARTRIDGE, TONER , INK , PENDRIVE, KEYBOARD, MOUSE ETC
name: M/S MAKMONI ENTERPRISES

idea:
A brief profile of India Speakers Bureau (ISB)

India Speakers Bureau (ISB) is one of the pioneers in bringing globally renowned speakers to Fortune 500 companies for over a decade now. ISB are only one of its kind bureau by providing their clients a comprehensive list of some of the globe`s most exceptional and influential achievers as speakers for top management in leadership talk, meetings, round table conference, strategies meet in virtual conference, knowledge based training programs, workshops, events, seminars and conferences anywhere around the globe. We have catered to some of the largest conferences, events and programs for our clients both in India and globally.
name: India Speaker Bureau

idea:
Alpha and Omega Group strives to enhance the potential of human life since 2009. We aim to serve many patients worldwide to cope up with exorbitant products which have gained public attention in the market thereby reaching out with extremely profitable and cost effective production accompanied with high quality products.

We are recognized for our orthopedic soft goods, neutraceutical, medical instruments and consumer goods. Our associations with pharmaceutical companies have helped us in attaining the objective of public welfare at profitable rates. We aim to outreach different parts of the world thereby serving as an aid to the world through each of our products.

With pride we claim to work in proficiency achieving international standards and equivalent certifications in order to gain popularization in the market worldwide.
name: ALPHA & OMEGA HEALTHCARE LLP

idea:
Venture Name: Freshcon Food products

Freshcon Food Products is a company formed with a vision of simplifying consumer’s lives by providing solutions for their unmet needs through frozen foods.

The company’s mission is to operate in Fresh & Convenient Food products platforms.

 The primary focus of the business will always be on a Consumer channel.

The company wishes to operate in new categories in consumer channel and create a niche for itself. The overall focus will be on bringing innovative new products, which are category creators.

The company is founded by group of  Food Technologists with a corporate experience of more than 20 yrs. Individually of launching various leading brands in India and abroad in consumer space.

The company is currently in a start up stage and had already launched its first product “Freshcon Shredded coconut”under the brand “Freshcon” across Mumbai.

Our vision for this venture is to put up a processing unit and offer the most economical and best quality products to the consumers.
name: Freshcon Food Products

idea:
To carry on the business in India or abroad as a designer, developer, manufacturers, distributors, agents, traders, importers and exporters, of or dealers in products, goods, articles, items, accessories or decorative items, ornamental concepts of whatsoever kind, nature or description and to carry on the business of arranging, promoting, and managing exhibitions, and product launch events, or consumer events on national and international level.


To act as consultants, franchisers, contractors, facilitators, decorators, designers, furnishers, landscapers, upholsters and model makers for all type of projects including but not limited to trade, construction, real estate, education, media and entertainment and to provide all kinds of creative services connected therewith and to deal with design publications, newsletters, design magazines, online media about the product launch, marketing, teaser campaign and other media.


To undertake all kinds of job as industrial designers, engineers, technicians, researchers, and render services in all other auxiliary fields and to deal in industrial products, materials, electrical and electronic goods, plastic, metals and other materials of construction as may be required for the purpose of prototyping, model making and product launch as well as world premiere events or consumer events.


To carry on the business of manufacturing all kinds of new products made from wood, brass, steel, fibre-glass, plastics, plastic composites, or any other light weight metal alloys, handicrafts, upholsteries, hirers, repairers, carpets, linolium, fabrics and other solid surface materials, decorative doors and panels, veneers, tiles, fancy electronic switches, fittings, moulded furniture and interior products, as well as electrical and electronic products.
name: SCD INNOVATIONS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Safe Space stands for Belonging, Healing and Connection for everyone. As an organisation, we are committed to partner with you in your journey of self-discovery, belonging and healing. We support you with evidence based self-guided tools, courses, and individual guidance that transform you into your most real self.

The aim is to reduce suicide and mental illness from a short term and long term perspective. It aims to educate and support with training and skill building in areas of crisis intervention in suicide, parenting and reduction of early childhood trauma, and ensuring people develop resilience skills to support themselves
name: Itai Doshin Services LLP

idea:
Gharpoch Connect is a first of its kind product delivery solutions company which is leveraging its human network to help businesses and products to reach every doorstep in every corner of Maharashtra.

“Gharpoch Connect” aims to sell, distribute and deliver novel and wellness products to our consumers through an easy to use mobile app / internet based platform on which our consumers can order their products which will be delivered by our salesman / marketing delivery representatives (“Samvadaks”).

“Gharpoch Connect” intends to deliver high quality fast moving consumer products in the category of Food and Wellness in addition to seasonal products. It has observed a wide gap in consumer connect as regards to the present business models in the market like Kirana Stores, Purely Online I.e. E‐Commerce companies.

Gharpoch Connect aims to optimize the consumer service model by combining the efficiencies of online models as well as the personal connect of brick‐mortar stores. Today there is a lack of an integrated shared service for supply chain network across Maharashtra state, which directly links ‐ Manufacturer to Market (M2M).

Gharpoch Connect will be an E‐Commerce company where ordering and processing of the products will be done online while the final connect with the end consumer will be through our representatives located in all corners of the Maharashtra to bring a personal touch to the entire process of consumer connect.

Our representative is called as ‘Samvadak’ who will also be personally promoting the products/brands, reminding the consumers regularly and will operate like a ‘Personal Product Consultant’ for the consumer.
name: GHARPOCH CONNECT PRIVATE LIMITED
